Uses of Class
com.turn.shapeshifter.NamedSchema

  • Packages that use NamedSchema 
    Package Description
    com.turn.shapeshifter  

    • Uses of NamedSchema in com.turn.shapeshifter

      Fields in com.turn.shapeshifter declared as NamedSchema 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static NamedSchema JsonSchemas.SCHEMA
      A schema properly configured to serialize instances of JSON schemas.
      Methods in com.turn.shapeshifter that return NamedSchema 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NamedSchema NamedSchema.addConstant(String key, String value)
      Returns a schema that will output an extra constant field in the JSON serialization.
      NamedSchema NamedSchema.describe(String fieldName, String description)
      Returns a new schema in which fieldName will be documented.
      NamedSchema NamedSchema.enumCaseFormat(CaseFormat caseFormat)
      Returns a schema that will use the specified casing to format enumeration values.
      NamedSchema SchemaRegistry.get(String name)
      Returns the schema identified by the given name, or null if no such schema is registered in this instance.
      NamedSchema NamedSchema.mapRepeatedField(String fieldName, String keyFieldName)
      Returns a new schema that will serialize repeated objects as a JSON object instead of a JSON array.
      static NamedSchema NamedSchema.of(Descriptors.Descriptor descriptor, String name)
      Returns a Schema that will serialize and parse Message corresponding to the given Descriptors.Descriptor.
      NamedSchema NamedSchema.setFormat(String fieldName, String format)
      Returns a new schema in which the given field with have a format attribute.
      NamedSchema NamedSchema.skip(String... names)
      Returns a schema that will not ignore the given field names for serialization and parsing purposes.
      NamedSchema NamedSchema.substitute(String fieldName, String substitution)
      Returns a schema that will substitute a given field name in the serialized JSON.
      NamedSchema NamedSchema.transform(String fieldName, FormatTransformer transformer)
      Returns a schema that will transforms the given field's value, with an added format specified in the resulting JSON Schema.
      NamedSchema NamedSchema.transform(String fieldName, Transformer transformer)
      Returns a schema that will transforms the given field's value.
      NamedSchema NamedSchema.useSchema(String fieldName, String schemaName)
      Returns a new schema in which the given field will be delegated to the specified schema.
      Methods in com.turn.shapeshifter that return types with arguments of type NamedSchema 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterator<NamedSchema> SchemaRegistry.getSchemas()
      Returns the set of schemas registered in this instance.
      Methods in com.turn.shapeshifter with parameters of type NamedSchema 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WritableSchemaRegistry.register(NamedSchema schema)
      Registers a named schema.
      void SchemaRegistry.register(NamedSchema schema)
      Registers a named schema.
